headline: 2 Pharmaceutical Growth Stocks to Buy Now and Hold for Decades
summary: If you're too busy to keep monitoring your stock portfolio every other day, then investing in stocks that won't cause you a lot of headache down the road is a necessity.  In order to do so, it's important to find reliable businesses that are also on a growth trajectory.  Eli Lilly (NYSE: LLY) and Novo Nordisk (NYSE: NVO) have attracted a lot of attention over the past two years thanks to their advances in the weight loss therapy market.
